Title: Hocus Pocus 2
Writer: Jen D'Angelo, David Kirschner, Blake Harris
Actors: Bette Midler, Sarah Jessica Parker, Kathy Najimy
Plot: Two young women accidentally bring back the Sanderson Sisters to modern day Salem and must figure out how to stop the child-hungry witches from wreaking havoc on the world.
Country: United States, Zambia, United Kingdom, Australia
Awards: Nominated for 3 Primetime Emmys. 2 wins & 17 nominations total
